name: NOMBZ: Night of a Million Billion Zombies!
name_original: NOMBZ: Night of a Million Billion Zombies!
description:
NOMBZ: Night of a Million Billion Zombies! is an action-shooter game developed by PowerUp Studios. It was originally released in 2008. It was published by PowerUp Studios.
You can play NOMBZ: Night of a Million Billion Zombies! on PC.
